extensionName.description: The name of the extension, displayed in the web store.
extensionName.message: QuillBot: AI Writing and Grammar Checker Tool

extensionDescription.description: The description of the extension, displayed in the web store.
extensionDescription.message: Elevate your writing with QuillBot's AI-powered productivity tools: Grammar Checker, Paraphrasing Tool, AI writer, and more!

notificationLollipopUndoDescription.description: Description of the notification shown after AI Text Cursor is disabled
notificationLollipopUndoDescription.message: To enable AI Text Cursor, go to settings to turn it back on.

notificationLollipopUndoLabel.description: Label of the notification shown after AI Text Cursor is disabled

toolboxOnboardingMessage.description: Body text for the onboarding dialog that explains the new features
toolboxOnboardingMessage.message: You can now use our tools anywhere you write. Simply click on the text cursor to rephrase text, edit using AI, or add emojis and GIFs.

toolboxOnboardingCtaLabel.description: Button text for the onboarding dialog that explains the new features

toolboxOnboardingHeading.description: Heading text for the onboarding dialog that explains the new features
toolboxOnboardingHeading.message: Let's get started with AI Text Cursor!

toolboxOnboardingLearnMore.description: 'Learn more' link in the onboarding dialog that explains the new features

toolboxTooltip.description: Tooltip text for the toolbox icon in the toolbox

toolboxKeyboardShortcut.description: Keyboard shortcut to open the toolbox
